channel.title: Contenu on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Contenu on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Change the number of product display
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Change the option Number of products to be displayed" to 12" A message should appear in green. Number of products should be 12 Go to the front office 12 featured product should be displayed Click on all products Home category should be displayed

item.title: Choose the category to display
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Change the option Category from which to pick products to be displayed" to 3" A message should appear in green. Category from which to pick products to be displayed should be 3 Go to front office The featured product should be the one in category 3

item.title: Randomly display featured products
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Enable the option Randomly display featured products" A message should appear in green. The option should be enabled Go to front office/check the homepage Product shouldn’t be display by id but randomly
